context: UK SIP The weighted average market value per ordinary share for SIP awards released in 2019 was 386.1p (2018: 372.0p). The SIP shares outstanding at 31 March 2018 have fully vested (2018: had a weighted average remaining vesting period of 0.1 years). Shares released prior to the vesting date relate to those attributable to good leavers as defined by the scheme rules.

questions.767f8459-e3ca-4188-af0f-2197c66e5061: What was the weighted average market value per ordinary share for SIP awards released in 2019?
questions.51a74718-17b2-43a3-b685-fc411890fc37: What does the Shares released prior to the vesting date relate to?
questions.a99af0e4-5c6b-4016-b88b-8f1ad2fb9fed: For which years was the amount Outstanding at 31 March calculated in?
questions.8414474d-b00d-4231-8973-9c76f29d3e1c: What was the change in the dividend shares awarded in 2019 from 2018?
questions.017d15d5-93f1-4f9a-b7c3-08cd59292dd6: What was the change in the amount Outstanding at 31 March in 2019 from 2018?
questions.babee4bb-4861-4918-9a8e-dbadec47fe94: What was the percentage change in the amount Outstanding at 31 March in 2019 from 2018?
